sentences.sContent: Jason Hinson, a sixth-generation corn farmer near Kingston, Iowa, keeps an eye on his auger as he unloads his combine on the fly.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jason Hinson, a sixth-generation corn farmer near Kingston, Iowa, keeps an eye on his auger as he unloads his combine on the fly.
sentences.sCn: 贾森·辛森，衣阿华州金士敦附近的第六代玉米农。 他一边把玉米从行进作业中的联合收割机上卸下来，一边观察着螺旋钻。

phrases.pCn: 螺旋钻；回转式钻岩机；螺旋钻井装置
螺旋钻机开采薄煤层法

trans.tranOther: a tool used for making a hole in wood or in the ground
